SystemBacktestResult.suggestion: If you want to refine this model, you can follow these suggestions, or directly ask me
SystemBacktestResult.title: Backtest Result

example1.title: Double Moving Average
example1.description: DMA Strategy is a simple trend following strategy. It uses two moving averages of different periods to determine the trend.

example2.title: R break strategy
example2.description: The core idea of the R-Breaker strategy is to capitalize on the patterns of price fluctuations to capture trading opportunities.

example3.title: Grid Trading
example3.description: Grid trading is a type of trading strategy that profits from the sideways as well as trending market conditions.
